english.segment1: Long before the earth. before there was light. Lord, you were. endless are you God. No time can contain. all you are
english.segment2: There's no other God before you. there is no one to replace you. you are forevermore
english.segment3: There's no other God I call to. You are the one I cling to. you are forevermore
english.segment4: faithful are you God. You never change. Lord, you are
english.segment5: Only you are God. forever you reign. above it all
english.segment6: There's no other God before you. there is no one to replace you. you are forevermore
english.segment7: There's no other God I call to. You are the one I cling to. you are forevermore
english.segment8: there's no other. no one greater. there is none like you (2X)
english.segment9: There's no other God before you. there is no one to replace you. you are forevermore
english.segment10: There's no other God I call to. You are the one I cling to. you are forevermore
english.segment11: There's no other God before you. there is no one to replace you. you are forevermore
english.segment12: There's no other God I call to. You are the one I cling to. you are forevermore
